ygData.subject: Testament of Vanear
ygData.msgSnippet: [Testament of Vanear] ... Well you re a priest, what s wrong with bashing a MOB over the head with your new bible? ;) BTW Dynil Fireshine was green to me at
ygData.messageBody:
[Testament of Vanear]
>Aye the book is the highest wis item in the game. I just have a problem
>holding it... I dont like it. I like a damn shield! I am a Cleric by the
>Gods not a damn MU!

Well you're a priest, what's wrong with bashing a MOB over the head with your new bible? ;)

BTW Dynil Fireshine was green to me at level 22 (when I killed him last Friday). I didn't camp him, just ducked in everytime I passed the area.
Got camo'ed and brought along 200+ gold to see Moodoro last night, but he gave me the Jester card on the second try! So basically it only cost me 1plat for the Testament. <big grin>

Anyhow, that's confirmed that the quest is working now for anyone worried about it still being broken (as I was).

Good luck,
Toryn 24th level cleric on Quellious


EOM
